FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: + . **NEMORALIA** (2013 f. by More Than Ready). 4 wins in 8 starts at 2 and 3, 227,984 Pounds, in England, 1st Sky Bet City Of York S. **[G3]**, Michael Seely Memorial Longines Irish Champions Weekend S. [L], 2nd Coronation S. **[G1]**; placed at 2, $200,000, in N.A./U.S., 2nd Frizette S. **[G1]** (BEL, $80,000), 3rd Breeders' Cup Juvenile Fillies Turf **[G1]** (KEE, $100,000); unplaced in 1 start, 22,840 Euro, in France. Returned to United States from Great Britain in 2015. Sent from United States to Great Britain in 2015. Returned to United States from Great Britain in 2016. Sent from United States to France in 2022. (Total: $544,633). Dam of 5 foals, 1 to race-- 274 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 **NEMORALIA** 2013 f **ALINA** + .
